column1: The following subsections describe the company information system details.  Part of the company cyber resiliency
assessment could also include physical security, personnel training and level of experience, operational policies and
procedures, and other factors in additional to the information system technical details.
Figure 3.1-1 provides an architecture view for the company’s information system that is under evaluation during this
challenge.  Note that there may be architecture design flaws that could impact the company’s cyber resilience.
